tool.name: Download using NCBI's SRA Toolkit fasterq-dump
tool.description: Use fasterq-dump from the SRA Toolkit to download SRA data file(s)

param.name: limit_fasta_lines
param.label: Max Number of FASTA lines (leave blank for all)

tool.help:
This tool uses sra-tools' fasterq-dump to download the FASTA for a single SRA. You may limit the FASTA size by specifying a value for limit_fasta_lines.
for more information on how fasterq-dump works, visit: https://github.com/ncbi/sra-tools/wiki/HowTo:-fasterq-dump https://github.com/ncbi/sra-tools/wiki/08.-prefetch-and-fasterq-dump
